column1: This stock will only make money in the years to come... They make renting homes a pleasure and they are affordable too. Its a win win.
INVH reached an all time high at 24.90

Invitation homes is really in a bad business. They rent homes to the everyday Joe and the everyday Joe doesn't like to pay on time (if ever). Then when they get evicted, the Joe's cry wolf. Then the public has sympathy for Joe and call companies like invh evil.
INVH reached a 52 Week low at 19.79
INVH reached an all time high at 32.35
I have 500 shares of INVH this will be worth $120 in about 5 years. Im a long term holder

Now that BX holds a significant number of shares in INVH it should be interesting. Several years ago Blockrock took over a dethrowned mogrtage REIT (Capital Trust, symbol CT) renamed it (BXMT) and did a multion million share secondary and today it trades at $32.70 up from single digits less than a decade ago. i HAVE NO FURTHER FACTS JUST HOPE !!!
INVH reached a 52 Week low at 16.70
INVH are SLUMLORDS don't support them by buying stock in an unethical company.
When will they announce their dividend?
INVH reached an all time high at 26.38
Graham Stephan's monkey picked this stock. let's go
Wtrh exploding back to 12 in a few days in a row, four to 46, zi to 80, nkla to 120Plug to 16
devastating article in NYT Magazine this am on INVH.
Oh boy checked out ULTIMAT STOKCALERTS (check them out) and they are killing it .

Last qt...invh would have had better eps, but they got stuck with some one-time IPO costs that bx would not cover. Every day we hear about the shortage of new and existing homes. This leads me to believe invh is ready to capitalize...this qt and rest of 2017. We'll know nx thur after market closes. Could be very good..

And here I thought that bx was the most frustrating stock ever...not so fast. We now have the son of bx namely invh. My point can be demonstrated by what happened...in last few hours. Invh announces a + 33 % increase in dividends, the stock advances smartly to $21.31...and since has pulled back to low of day to $21.03. Nothing sticks regardless of the good news...
Volume is good. Buy rating: 5.5, target: 39.63, according to 9trading.
